about_the_game:
The Celestials have been fighting amongst each other for millennia, now their trifles and battles have spilled over to the mortal realm. Your country just like all the others is now caught up in this chaotic war between all powerful kids.

War of Celestials is a Open World MMO RPG set in the fantasy world of Levonium. Team up in a party of 4 with your friends to complete dungeons and take on quests and contracts to improve your skill. Dedicate yourself to a Celestials and gain a portion of their power through blessings, the more you do for them the stronger the blessing gets.

Unlike most MMORPG games, War of Celestials focuses on the idea of Permanent death, but instead of once you die that's it character gone each character has seven lives. These live are replenished at each level of blessing.

Features

  • 4 Base Classes, 8+ Sub Classes
  • 6 Celestials to choose from
  • Procedurally generated dungeons
  • 16 Skills to use
  • Character Life force

This game is developed by one developer so don't expect frequent updates
Join the Official Discord to receive frequent updates on progress URL:

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is highly Violent and there is Graphical Blood, It's not extreme but the game is based around Horror elements and as such there is Blood and Gore scenes.

PvP is planned for the future

name: War Of Celestials

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Join the fight for world domination as the Celestials fight over territory. Play your way with multiple different classes and sub classes. Want to assassinate people or perhaps you want to cast fire ball no matter the room size, either way there is a play style for everyone.
